definition: sleeveless garment (vest, waistcoat, singlet, tank top etc)/CL:件[jian4]
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 bei4 xin1

sentences.english: The personal clothing of this soldier of the future would be lightweight with a bullet-proof jacket.
sentences.chinese: 未来士兵的服装重量将更轻，并装备防弹背心。

sentences.english: I hold the Cupid's arrow chasing you, you're wearing a bulletproof vest to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我举着丘比特的箭追呀追，你穿着防弹背心飞呀飞。

sentences.english: and to make really bullet-proof vests.
sentences.chinese: 还可以制造真正的防弹背心。

sentences.english: Longrun supply reflecting light undershirt of our company.
sentences.chinese: 我公司长期供应反光背心。

sentences.english: He wore a woolen vest beneath his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他在衬衫里面穿了件毛背心。

sentences.english: Borrowing your favourite jumper and making it smell like a girl.
sentences.chinese: 问你借最喜欢的背心并且让它闻起来想个女孩的。

sentences.english: Grace tried on dresses over her shorts and tank top .
sentences.chinese: 格雷斯试穿婚纱时仅穿著短裤和背心。

sentences.english: The men, gorged with food, had unbuttoned their vests .
sentences.chinese: 那些男人，吃得直打饱嗝，解开了背心的钮扣。

sentences.english: They wear singlet and mini skirt.
sentences.chinese: 她们穿着背心和超短裙。

sentences.english: Reflection Vests including reticulation cloth and polyester cloth.
sentences.chinese: 反思包括背心网状布和涤纶布。

sentences.english: Today, I told my mom that I'd outgrown one of my tank tops because I've gone up two cup sizes since buying it.
sentences.chinese: 今天我对我妈说我的罩杯大了两号有件背心穿不下了。

sentences.english: V-neck sporty vest with a graffiti graphic print.
sentences.chinese: 领运动背心有涂鸦设计印花。

sentences.english: He was dripping with sweat, his vest sticking to his torso.
sentences.chinese: 他汗流如注，背心全贴在身上了。

sentences.english: C arlos: Mm-hmm, you wore a white linen sundress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿了一件白色亚麻背心裙。

sentences.english: Learn how to fold a camisole in this free clothing care video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在这个自由折叠衣物护理的视频背心。

sentences.english: I saw Shaima when they put the vest on her.
sentences.chinese: 我看到他们给莎依玛穿上炸弹背心。

definition: garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
